languages.text: {n}В голосе Ульфара нет злорадства, лишь спокойное удовлетворение.{/n} "Прощай, нелюдь. Я ведь предупреждал, что однажды этот миг придет. Ты, безусловно, не самое мерзкое отродье своего вида, даже имеешь некоторые принципы, но... Так будет просто правильно".

{n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе Ульфара нет злорадства, лишь спокойное удовлетворение.{/n} "Прощай, нелюдь. Я ведь предупреждал, что однажды этот миг придет. Ты, безусловно, не самое мерзкое отродье своего вида, даже имеешь некоторые принципы, но... Так будет просто правильно".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, inhuman. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

{n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, inhuman. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

{n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, inhuman. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

{n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの声に勝ち誇った響きはなく、静かな満足だけがある。{/n}「お別れだ、異種族よ。こんな瞬間がいつか来ると、俺は警告した。確かにお前は卑劣極まりない同類とは違う、ある意味、信念さえ持っている、だが…。これが正しい。分かりきったことだ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの声に勝ち誇った響きはなく、静かな満足だけがある。{/n}「お別れだ、人ならざるものよ。こんな瞬間がいつか来ると、俺は警告した。確かにお前は卑劣極まりない同類とは違う、ある意味、信念さえ持っている、だが…。これが正しい。分かりきったことだ」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的语气里没有幸灾乐祸，只有平静的满足。{/n}“永别了，异形。我早就警告过你，总有一天你会面对这样的结果。你并不是你们种族中最卑鄙的家伙，甚至算得上是恪守原则，但是……这么做是对的，就是这么简单。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的语气里没有幸灾乐祸，只有平静的满足。{/n}“永别了，异形。我早就警告过你，总有一天你会面对这样的结果。你并不是你们种族中最卑鄙的家伙，甚至可以算得上是有原则，但是……我这么做是对的，就是这么简单。”

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar n'est pas triomphante. Elle ne traduit qu'une discrète satisfaction.{/n} « Adieu, xénos. Je vous avais avertie que ce moment viendrait. Vous n'êtes certainement pas le plus vil produit de votre espèce, vous avez même des principes, mais... vous tuer est dans l'ordre des choses, tout simplement. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar n'est pas triomphante. Elle ne traduit qu'une discrète satisfaction.{/n} « Adieu, inhumaine. Je vous avais avertie que ce moment viendrait. Vous n'êtes certainement pas le plus vil produit de votre espèce, vous avez même des principes, mais... vous tuer est dans l'ordre des choses, tout simplement. »

languages.text: {n}En la voz de Ulfar no hay atisbo de regodeo, sino una tranquila satisfacción.{/n} «Adiós, xenos. Te advertí de que algún día llegaría este momento. Si bien no eres el engendro más vil de tu especie e incluso tienes principios... esto es lo que ha de hacerse. Así de simple».
languages.original_text: {n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

traits.locale_text: {n}En la voz de Ulfar no hay atisbo de regodeo, sino una tranquila satisfacción.{/n} «Adiós, ser inhumano. Te advertí de que algún día llegaría este momento. Si bien no eres el engendro más vil de tu especie e incluso tienes principios... esto es lo ha de hacerse. Así de simple».

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst keine Häme in Ulfars Stimme, nur stille Befriedigung.{/n} "Lebt wohl, Xenos. Ich habe Euch gewarnt, dass dieser Moment eines Tages kommen würde. Ihr seid gewiss nicht der übelste Vertreter Eurer Brut, habt auf gewisse Weise sogar Prinzipien, aber ... Es ist richtig so. Ganz einfach."
languages.original_text: {n}There is no gloating in Ulfar's voice, only quiet satisfaction.{/n} "Farewell, xenos. I warned you that one day this moment would come. You are certainly not the vilest spawn of your species, you are even principled in a way, but... This is right. Simple as that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst keine Häme in Ulfars Stimme, nur stille Befriedigung.{/n} "Lebt wohl, Nicht-Mensch. Ich habe Euch gewarnt, dass dieser Moment eines Tages kommen würde. Ihr seid gewiss nicht der übelste Vertreter Eurer Brut, habt auf gewisse Weise sogar Prinzipien, aber ... Es ist richtig so. Ganz einfach."
